body.string: {"generationConfig":{"thinkingConfig":{"thinkingBudget":0},"maxOutputTokens":128,"temperature":0.0},"tools":{"function_declarations":[{"name":"get_location","description":"The get_location tool will return the users city, state or province and country."}]},"systemInstruction":{"role":"user","parts":[{"text":"You are a helpfull assistant who answers questions succinctly."}]},"contents":[{"role":"user","parts":[{"text":"Where am I located?"}]},{"role":"model","parts":[{"functionCall":{"name":"get_location","args":null}}]},{"role":"user","parts":[{"functionResponse":{"name":"get_location","response":{"name":"get_location","content":"Seattle, WA, USA"}}}]}]}
